<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42;PerSym = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ehstreamer/#a346d40526a13ec03f632cd9fd1b51ca9">Asm</a>-&gt;TM.getSymbol(Per);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  emitExceptionInfoTable(LSDALabel, PerSym);</span></CodeLine>
